document.full_text: boeing co  is leaning toward building a new variant of its popular 737 aircraft rather than simply placing more efficient engines on the current design, a senior company executive said on wednesday.
document.title: boeing leans toward new 737, more clarity this summer
lines_and_colors: boeing co  is leaning toward building a new variant of its popular 737 aircraft rather than simply placing more efficient engines on the current design, a senior company executive said on wednesday.
